ComicInfo.Penciller: Alberto Ponticelli,Greg Scott,Joe Orsak,Richard Williams,Alberto Ponticelli,Greg Scott
ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Blood
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sherlock Holmes returns to investigate murders from two Poe stories, but things get confusing in "The Adventure of the Three Narrators" by Paul Cornell (Doctor Who) and Greg Scott (High Heaven). Plus! A sea calamity yields absurd surprises in Poe's "Ms Found in a Bottle" by Kek-w (2000 AD) and Alberto Ponticelli (Bronze Age Boogie)! Plus the usual AHOY illustrated prose stories.
